Basic: Basic Greetings: Guten Tag, Auf Wiedersehen, Danke
Basic Body Parts: Kopf, Hand, Fuß
Yes and No: Ja and Nein
Please and Thank You: Bitte, Danke
Beginner: Introduction to German and Basic Greetings
Common Nouns and Articles (der, die, das)
Present Tense of Regular and Irregular Verbs
Essential Vocabulary: Family, Colors, and Days of the Week
Intermediate: Irregular Verbs: sein, haben, werden, modal verbs
Subjunctive Mood: Konjunktiv I and II
Advanced: Advanced Subjunctive: Complex Uses and Expressions
Perfect Tenses: Plusquamperfekt and Future Perfect
Advanced Grammar: Word Order and Complex Sentences
Advanced Conversation: Nuances and Regional Variations
